description: This quick, sweet and salty salad makes a perfect lunch or light dinner.
name: Asian Style Steak & Mango Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, peeled and sliced
1 medium mango, peeled, cored and sliced thinly

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients for the dressing in a small bowl. Pour half the dressing into a Ziplock bag, add the steaks and leave to marinate for 15 minutes.
Add the sliced red onions to the remaining dressing and leave to steep. In a pan on a medium heat, toast the cashew nuts for 2-3 minutes until lightly golden, remove from the pan and set aside.
Increase the heat to high and fry the steaks for 2-3 minutes on each side depending on thickness, remove from the pan and wrap in foil. Rest for 5 minutes.
Place the lettuce, mango and cashews in a bowl, pour over the red onions and dressing and toss well.
Divide the salad between four plates, top each with sliced steak and chopped coriander and serve.
